value:
Morphs, huh? Never heard of 'em...
What I wanna know is...what the hell
is going on with my body?

Somewhere along the way, we took a
wrong turn... Was it her fault, or were
we on that path from the start?

Our prey is right in front of us...
So let's stop licking our chops and
take a bite already!

Father, Brother, where did... Right,
Nino was... No, wait. I don't get it.
I don't get any of this...

It's getting harder to move... Little
by little, my body's growing colder
from the inside out...
Huh? Who are you? Why...am I here?

The Fang's justice has been
dispensed... The end is coming
for all of you.

Once the Mad Dog's teeth find
your throat, there's no loosening
his grip...

Ugh... Lloyd, where are you?
Answer me, please...

What are you...going to make me
do with this?

I am of the Black Fang... Or am I?
Why can't I remember? My name
is... Linus. I think...

We, the Black Fang... We fought to
embolden the weak...protect the
vulnerable...uplift the downtrodden.$k$pAll this...without excess or cruelty.
We lived to dispense the Fang's
justice...unto the truly deserving.$k$pMy father, my brother...Legault and
the rest... We were bound by trust,
each of us of the same mind.$k$pUntil that woman came along... She
took all that we had...and shattered
it to pieces...$k$pIs this...all that's left of my sanity?
I can feel it slipping away...as my
body grows colder...
The Fang's justice!
I'll crush you!
I won't miss!
Silence!
Lloyd…
I'm of the Fang...
Brother...is that you?
The Mad Dog. Yes… That's right. That's me.
Nino? Nino... I know I've heard that name before...
My father and brother do not make mistakes…
Father... How could you trust that woman?
You... I won't kill you…
Oh.
Where am I?
You can't escape...
